name: like a boss-rush thing?
description:
Boss Rush! Fight three unique bosses in an Undertale inspired battle system. Between each fight, dive deep into a truly thought-provoking meta story about game development (very deep) (much wow)

Arrow keys or WASD to move

Enter or Z to attack/skip text (press enter when on the randomly appearing "attack" icon to damage bosses)

Programming and Sfx: TheDerpie(DeltaNeverUsed)

Art: ASillyVole

Music: Osun (https://www.youtube.com/osun6)
